title: Which guitar was Eddie Van Halen's favorite? - Quora

response.answer_text: He never went on record saying that he had a single, favorite guitar, and he did have and play a bunch of them; Fenders and Gibsons are notoriously hard to tap and their tones are warmer and virtually untweakable; he was looking for a different kind of beast so he had to create it from scratch; Charvel? Maybe.
I believe eddie’s favorite guitar which he called Frankenstein was made up of parts from different guitars
